General.Name: Shanghai DaZhong Public Utilities Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Dazhong Public Utilities(Group) Co.,Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the piped gas supply and wastewater treatment activities in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in six segments: Piped Gas Supply; Wastewater Treatment; Public Infrastructure Projects; Investments; Transportation Services; and Financial Services. It sells, distributes, and supplies piped natural gas; constructs and installs gas pipelines; invests in, constructs, and operates sewage and industrial wastewater treatment plants; and provides freight transport, relocation, supply chain, postal, and LPG delivery services. In addition, it offers financial services, including financial leasing and pre-paid cards; and scientific research and technological services. Further, the company engages in the municipal road operation; agriculture development; payment; assets management; and financial consultancy activities, as well as invests in special-purpose funds, private funds, and other channels. It owns approximately 6,867 kilometers of natural gas pipeline. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Pudong Dazhong Taxi Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Dazhong Public Utilities(Group) Co.,Ltd. in May 2003. Shanghai Dazhong Public Utilities(Group) Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
